title: I.D magazine font ID
content:
Hello, I picked up a copy of I.D magazine in my school library and am intruiged by the typeface.

Does anyone know what it is?

PS. it’s the one they use for all the body copy and most of the headers too.

Thank You very much.

 [‹ Help please with this font!!](http://web.archive.org/web/20071129212402/http:/www.typophile.com/node/39490 "Go to previous forum topic") [similar gothic font ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071129212402/http:/www.typophile.com/node/39491 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Yehan

comments.content:
Hi Mark,  
I can’t see no image …  
… but have a look a [this thread](http://web.archive.org/web/20071129212402/http:/www.typophile.com/node/2551).  
F
its avenir, if memory serves correctly.
if you are talking about i.d. and not i-D, they are also using akkurat for the display sans as well.

Sorry..my bad. No pictures. Anyway..I found it. It was in the thread Hardwig posted (thank you!)

Thank you!
